aac-m.sql: SELECT {3} ,SUM(a.subAmount) AS amount ,SUM(a.qty) AS qty FROM ( SELECT a.name AS partner ,c.name AS category ,p.name AS product ,( l.price * ( 100 - ISNULL(l.discount, 0) ) / 100 * l.qty ) AS subAmount ,( l.qty ) AS qty ,CONVERT(varchar(7), h.orderDate, 23) AS month FROM member.storeOrderHead h ,member.storeOrderLine l ,member.users u ,member.users su ,member.agent a ,member.storeProduct p ,member.storeCategory c WHERE h.id = l.headID AND h.memberID = u.ID AND u.agentId = a.id AND su.id = h.saleID AND p.id = l.productID AND c.id = p.categoryID and h.type='SO' AND h.status='confirm' AND su.agentId={0} AND h.orderDate>='{1}' AND h.orderDate<'{2}' union all SELECT '淘宝' ,sc.name ,sp.name ,( o.payment - h.discount_fee / ( COUNT(1) OVER ( PARTITION BY o.tid ) ) ) / 100 ,o.num ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(7), o.pay_time, 23) AS month FROM ( SELECT o.* ,ISNULL(i.storeProductId, s.storeProductId) AS storeProductId FROM dbo.orders o LEFT JOIN dbo.skus s ON s.sku_id = o.sku_id INNER JOIN dbo.items i ON i.num_iid = o.num_iid WHERE is_detail = 1 ) o INNER JOIN member.storeProduct sp ON sp.id = o.storeProductId INNER JOIN member.storeCategory sc ON sc.id = sp.categoryID INNER JOIN dbo.orders h ON h.oid != o.oid AND h.oid = o.tid AND h.is_main = 1 where o.pay_time>='{1}' AND o.pay_time<'{2}' and sp.storeId={0} and o.status in ('TRADE_FINISHED', 'WAIT_SELLER_SEND_GOODS', 'WAIT_BUYER_CONFIRM_GOODS') ) AS a GROUP BY {3} ORDER BY SUM(a.subAmount) DESC

SELECT {3} ,SUM(a.subAmount) AS amount ,SUM(a.qty) AS qty FROM ( SELECT a.name AS partner ,c.name AS category ,p.name AS product ,( l.price * ( ISNULL(l.discount, 0)-100 ) / 100 * l.qty ) AS subAmount ,( l.qty*-1 ) AS qty ,rr.name as reason ,CONVERT(varchar(7), h.orderDate, 23) AS month FROM member.storeOrderHead h ,member.storeOrderLine l ,member.users u ,member.users su ,member.agent a ,member.storeProduct p ,member.storeCategory c ,member.soReturnReason rr WHERE h.id = l.headID AND h.memberID = u.ID AND u.agentId = a.id AND su.id = h.saleID and h.type='RT' and rr.id=h.reasonId AND p.id = l.productID AND c.id = p.categoryID AND h.status='confirm' AND su.agentId={0} AND h.orderDate>='{1}' AND h.orderDate<'{2}' ) AS a GROUP BY {3} ORDER BY SUM(a.subAmount) DESC
UPDATE member.agent SET companyId={0} WHERE id IN ({1})

SELECT {3} ,SUM(a.qty) AS qty FROM ( SELECT st.qty ,sp.name AS product ,sc.name AS category ,CONVERT(varchar(7), st.inDate, 23) AS month FROM member.stockTran st ,member.storeProduct sp ,member.storeCategory sc WHERE st.destID = {0} AND sp.fromID=st.productID AND sp.storeID=st.destID AND sc.id=sp.categoryID AND st.inDate>='{1}' AND st.inDate<'{2}' ) as a group by {3} order by sum(qty) desc

sql.name: agent.base.soProductQuery
sql.comment: 退货中查询未退的销售单

aac-m.sql: select * from ( SELECT 'MSO' + CAST(h.id AS VARCHAR(10)) AS num ,a.name as aname ,p.name as pname ,l.qty+(SELECT ISNULL(SUM(sl.qty),0) FROM member.storeOrderLine sl WHERE sl.fromId=l.id) as qty ,ISNULL(l.comment, h.note) AS comment ,h.orderDate ,l.id ,p.fromId ,l.price*(100-l.discount)/100 as price ,f.id as fid ,f.text FROM member.storeOrderHead h ,member.storeOrderLine l ,member.storeProduct p ,member.users u ,member.agent a ,member.users su ,dbo.flex f WHERE h.id = l.headID AND l.productID = p.fromID AND p.storeID = su.agentId AND su.id = h.saleID AND u.id = h.memberID AND u.agentId = a.id and f.type=10000 and f.value=p.uom and u.id={0} and h.saleId={1} and {2} and h.type in ('SO') ) as a where a.qty>0 order by a.num desc,a.id /*在多用户的情况下存在bug*/

SELECT sp.fromID ,sc.name ,sp.name ,s.qty ,sp.price ,sp.description ,sp.id storeProductId FROM member.storeProduct sp ,member.stock s ,member.storeCategory sc WHERE sp.storeID = {0} AND sc.id = sp.categoryID AND s.productId = sp.fromID AND s.agentId = sp.storeID and sc.id={2}

SELECT l.productID ,ISNULL(sp.name, p.name) AS NAME ,l.price ,f.text AS uom ,l.qty ,NULL,discount ,NULL comment ,l.id ,NULL amount ,ISNULL(sp.code, p.code) AS code ,'MSO' + CAST(sh.id AS VARCHAR(10)) AS hNumber ,av1.text AS attr1text ,av2.text AS attr2text ,sp.categoryID ,l.pickingId FROM member.stockTran l LEFT JOIN member.storeOrderLine sl ON sl.id = l.fromId LEFT JOIN member.storeOrderHead sh ON sh.id = sl.headID LEFT JOIN member.storeProduct sp ON sp.storeID = l.fromID AND l.productID = sp.fromID ,member.product p LEFT JOIN base.attributeValue av1 ON av1.id = p.attribute1 LEFT JOIN base.attributeValue av2 ON av2.id = p.attribute2 ,dbo.Flex AS f WHERE l.productID = p.id AND p.uom = f.value AND f.type = 10000 AND l.pickingId in ({0}) order by l.pickingId
